p: Past advancements in WBE have primarily relied on environmental scientists and analytical chemists, as the targeted analytes of interest had generally been anthropogenic, synthetic chemicals ( Daughton, 2018). To expand the usefulness of WBE to infectious diseases and biomolecules, a much broader range of science disciplines will be required, in larger collaborations. Evidence that this is already happening can be seen with more involvement of microbiology (e.g., Wigginton and Boehm, 2020).
